title: Annual Compliance For Private Limited Company

sections.heading: Complete Compliance Guide for Private Limited Companies
content: Private Limited Companies in India must comply with annual and event-based requirements under the Companies Act, 2013 and Income Tax Act. Missing deadlines can result in penalties and director disqualification.

sections.heading: What is Compliance?
content: Compliance for a Private Limited Company includes:

sections.heading: Note
content: Compliance is mandatory even with zero business activity.

list.title: Is compliance required with zero business activity?
points: Yes. All companies, including those with no turnover, must file annual compliance.

list.title: What are the consequences of missing ROC filings?
points: Daily late fees, potential DIN deactivation for directors, and company non-compliance status.

list.title: How many directors are required?
points: Minimum 2 directors are mandatory at all times.

list.title: Is GST filing included?
points: No. GST compliance is separate and required only if registered.

list.title: Can filings be done online?
points: Yes. All filings are submitted through MCA and Income Tax portals.

points: Yes. We provide comprehensive, affordable annual compliance packages.
